mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_notice ORDER BY notice_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_notice(notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_subject, attach_file) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSubject}, #{attachFile})
